about_the_game:
Explore the captivating world of our upcoming indie 2D MMORPG. Engage in action combat, character growth, and player-driven stories that set the stage for your adventure.

Dive into battles that require skill and strategy, shaping your character from novice to expert. Customize your hero with carefully crafted equipment as you uncover the mysteries of the realm.

Join a community of like-minded players to form alliances and share your exploits. Confront challenging foes, unearth hidden secrets, and make your mark on the game's narrative.

Experience a gaming journey where your choices matter. Will you answer the call? Join us and be part of the evolution of MMORPGs. Your destiny awaits.
detailed_description:
Explore the captivating world of our upcoming indie 2D MMORPG. Engage in action combat, character growth, and player-driven stories that set the stage for your adventure.

Dive into battles that require skill and strategy, shaping your character from novice to expert. Customize your hero with carefully crafted equipment as you uncover the mysteries of the realm.

Join a community of like-minded players to form alliances and share your exploits. Confront challenging foes, unearth hidden secrets, and make your mark on the game's narrative.

Experience a gaming journey where your choices matter. Will you answer the call? Join us and be part of the evolution of MMORPGs. Your destiny awaits.
ext_user_account_notice: Tales of Landor - Game Account (Supports Linking to Steam Account)

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04
  • Processor: Intel Core 3rd Generation
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 compatible
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04
  • Processor: Intel Core 5th Generation
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or Vulkan compatible
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.13 Sierra
  • Processor: Intel Core 3rd Generation
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 compatible
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
mac_requirements.recommended:

  • Processor: Intel Core 5th Generation
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or Vulkan compatible
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any

name: Tales of Landor

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: Intel Core 3rd Generation
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 compatible
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel Core 5th Generation
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or Vulkan compatible
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any

short_description: Indie 2D MMORPG in development with focus on action combat, character progression and player driven stories. Join the community and fight for glory.
